hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EMAIL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the user's email or username. The user must exist in the Database.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CONNECTION_ID_LOCAL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: connection id from the connection table for the user's connection.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash # Check if the database root user has been set if [ -z "$database_root_user_secret_name" ]; then echo "The 'database_root_user_secret_name' must be set in the global configuration" exit; fi
# Source folder containing the scripts source_scripts_folder="${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/Bash_Functions/" ls -la "$source_scripts_folder"
# Iterate through the files in the folder and source them for script_file in "$source_scripts_folder"*.sh; do chmod +x "$script_file" if [ -f "$script_file" ] && [ -x "$script_file" ]; then echo "sourcing $script_file" source "$script_file" fi done
assume_role
CONNECTION_ID="${connection_id:-$CONNECTION_ID_LOCAL}"
echo "Connection ID: $CONNECTION_ID" echo "Email: $EMAIL"
# Getting a secret value by secret name dbuser_pass=$(fetch_secret "$database_root_user_secret_name")
# dbuser - seems to be the root user dbuser_username=$(extract_field "$dbuser_pass" "username") dbuser_password=$(extract_field "$dbuser_pass" "password") dbuser_host=$(extract_field "$dbuser_pass" "host")
# Initialize database connection information initialize_shared_db_config "${dbuser_host%:3306}" "$dbuser_username" "$dbuser_password" create_top_admin "$EMAIL" "$CONNECTION_ID" unset_shared_db_config reset_role
